name: 2 x 10 Inches Universal Radiator Coolant Overflow Puke Tank Bottle Catch Can Polished Stainless Steel with Twist Cap 12 Ounces
short_description: 【Material】Radiator Coolant Overflow Tank Bottle Catch Can made of high-quality stainless steel, Polished Surface, rust resistant and corrosion resistant for optimal durability and longevity, Comes with complete mounting brackets and hardware.

【Function】With the overflow vent in the bottom,once the liquid gets to a certain level, built-in long tube which extends into the container will spills out to prevent leakage. Overflow tank connected with the radiator is sufficient to catch any overflowing coolant.
【Advantage】Stainless Radiator Coolant Overflow Reservoir Tank, Twist-On Aluminum Cap Material with Polished Finish, Slip-On Inlet and Outlet Style, and Vented.
【Compatibility】Compatible with most hot rods and classic engines, Compatible with GM, Chevy, GMC, Cadillac, Pontiac, Buick, Ford, Chrysler, Dodge, etc.

【Product Size】2 inches cylinder diameter, 10 inches tank body length, cap thickness is extra 0.5 inch, 12 oz Capacity. Package includes: Overflow Tank x 1, Accessories including L-brackets, bolts, nylon lock nuts. Please measure your spacing before placing order.

short_description: Coolant Overflow Tank: The radiator overflow tank size is 6.6 x 4.5 x 3.35 inch and capacity of 1L . The interface is a barb inlet fitting thread size is M14 x 1.5, fit with 3/8" ID fuel hose

Universal Coolant Overflow Tank: The 1L storage capacity is perfect for most vehicles, preventing leaks and maintaining proper functioning. Please measure before purchase to make sure there is enough space for installation
Materials: The radiator reservoir tank is made of 6061 aluminum alloy and has an anodized surface finish. Using sophisticated welding techniques, enhanced sealing and stability

Universal Function: When the coolant pressure in the radiator exceeds the pressure cap setting, the coolant seals through the pressure cap and flows through the overflow tube into the radiator coolant overflow tank. Side hose allows for continuous monitoring of oil capacity in the tank

Stay Cool on the Road: Bottom port is radiator overflow,the top port is the tank overflow. Don't let coolant issues overheat your vehicle. With our black coolant overflow tank, you can keep your engine running smoothly and maintain the optimal coolant pressure
